languages.text: "Оно сильно, но и я не слаб. Прежде я выживал, потому что так велел мне долг перед братьями — перебороть любую рану, вновь встать в строй, защитить, уберечь... Теперь сего долга нет, и ничто не держит меня здесь. Может, теперь я смогу умереть".

"It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."
languages.original_text: "Оно сильно, но и я не слаб. Прежде я выживал, потому что так велел мне долг перед братьями — перебороть любую рану, вновь встать в строй, защитить, уберечь... Теперь сего долга нет, и ничто не держит меня здесь. Может, теперь я смогу умереть".

traits.locale_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here. Perhaps now I can die."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here. Perhaps now I can die."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here. Perhaps now I can die."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Es fuerte, pero yo no soy débil. Hasta ahora, sobrevivía porque me impulsaba mi deber hacia mis hermanos. Me impulsaba a ignorar las heridas, a volver a luchar, a defender, a proteger... ahora ese deber ha desaparecido y no hay nada que me retenga aquí».
languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

traits.locale_text: «Es fuerte, pero yo no soy débil. Hasta ahora, sobrevivía porque me impulsaba mi deber hacia mis hermanos. Me impulsaba a ignorar las heridas, a volver a luchar, a defender, a proteger... ahora ese deber ha desaparecido y no hay nada que me retenga aquí. Tal vez ahora pueda morir».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “它很强大，但我也并不软弱。在这之前，我之所以能活下来，是因为我对兄弟们的责任迫使我……摆脱所有伤痛，重新加入战斗，守卫，保护……现在，那些责任已不复存在，没有什么能把我困在这里了。”
languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

traits.locale_text: “它很强大，但我也并不软弱。在这之前，我之所以能活下来，是因为我对兄弟们的责任迫使我……摆脱所有伤痛，重新加入战斗，守卫，保护……现在，那些责任已不复存在，没有什么能把我困在这里了。也许，我可以安心去死了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「確かに強い力だが、俺は弱くない。以前は兄弟たちへの義務ゆえに俺は生き残った。どんな傷も一笑して流し、何度でも戦い、守り、保護する…今はその義務はなくなり、俺をここに縛り付けるものは何もない」
languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに強い力だが、俺は弱くない。以前は兄弟たちへの義務ゆえに俺は生き残った。どんな傷も一笑して流し、何度でも戦い、守り、保護する…今はその義務はなくなり、俺をここに縛り付けるものは何もない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Elle est puissante, oui, mais je ne suis pas sans défense. Avant, je survivais parce que mon devoir envers mes frères m'y obligeait. Livrer bataille au mépris des blessures, défendre et protéger les siens... Désormais, je ne suis plus lié par ce pacte et plus rien ne me retient ici. »
languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

traits.locale_text: « Elle est puissante, oui, mais je ne suis pas sans défense. Avant, je survivais parce que mon devoir envers mes frères m'y obligeait. Livrer bataille au mépris des blessures, défendre et protéger les siens... Désormais, je ne suis plus lié par ce pacte et plus rien ne me retient ici. Peut-être vais-je enfin pouvoir mourir. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Er ist stark, doch ich bin nicht schwach. Bisher habe ich überlebt, weil meine Pflicht meinen Brüdern gegenüber es von mir verlangte – jede Wunde zu ignorieren, wieder in den Kampf zu stürmen, zu verteidigen, zu beschützen ... Nun ist diese Pflicht fort, und nichts hält mich mehr hier."
languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist stark, doch ich bin nicht schwach. Bisher habe ich überlebt, weil meine Pflicht meinen Brüdern gegenüber das von mir verlangte — jede Wunde zu ignorieren, wieder in den Kampf zu stürmen, zu verteidigen, zu beschützen ... Nun ist diese Pflicht fort und nichts hält mich mehr hier. Vielleicht kann ich nun sterben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

languages.text: "Güçlü, evet ama ben de zayıf değilim. Kardeşlerime karşı görevim beni tüm yaralarımı görmezden gelmeye, savaşa yeniden katılmaya, savunmaya, korumaya zorladığı için evvelden hayatta kaldım. Bu görev artık tamamlandı. Beni burada tutan hiçbir şey yok."
languages.original_text: "It is strong, but I am not weak. Before, I survived because my duty to my brothers compelled me — to shrug off any wound, to rejoin the fight, to defend, to protect... Now that duty is gone and nothing is holding me here."

traits.locale_text: "Güçlü, evet ama ben de zayıf değilim. Daha önceden kardeşlerime karşı görevim beni tüm yaralarımı görmezden gelmeye, savaşa yeniden katılmaya, savunmaya, korumaya zorladığı için hayatta kalmıştım. Bu görev artık tamamlandı ve beni burada tutan hiçbir şey yok."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
